pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimate Brain Networks and Connectivity with Population-Derived Priors // Implements Bayesian brain mapping models, including the prior ICA (independent components analysis) model proposed in Mejia et al. (2020) doi:10.1080/01621459.2019.1679638 and the spatial prior ICA model proposed in proposed in Mejia et al. (2022) doi:10.1080/10618600.2022.2104289. Both models estimate subject-level brain as deviations from known population-level networks, which are estimated using standard ICA algorithms. Both models employ an expectation-maximization algorithm for estimation of the latent brain networks and unknown model parameters. Includes direct support for 'CIFTI', 'GIFTI', and 'NIFTI' neuroimaging file formats.
